SEARCH
Package lab3

Class AbstractChessPiece

java.lang.Object
lab3.AbstractChessPiece
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChessPiece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, Knight, Queen, Rook
public abstract class AbstractChessPiece extends Object implements ChessPiece
Abstract base class for implementations of ChessPiece. This class contains all the method definitions that are common to the concrete implementations of the ChessPiece interface. A new implementation of the interface has the option of extending this class, or directly implementing all the methods.

    • AbstractChessPiece

      protected AbstractChessPiece(int row, int col, Color color) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a AbstractChessPiece object using row, col, and color provided.
      Parameters:
      row - the row to which this chess piece can be moved.
      col - the col to which this chess piece can be moved.
      color - the color of the chess piece checking for.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - for any values less than zero.

      Parameters:
